1.0.name: wordpress/follow-nofollow-control
1.0.description:
You can set default to all your external links on your posts are follow or nofollow. You can exclude some domains you want. If you have trouble, please go to the Plugin Site.

With this plugin, you can:

  • set all external links are nofollow
  • set all external links are nofollow except some domain you choose
  • set all external links are follow
  • set all external links are follow except some domain you choose
